passive.name: Hard Hit
passive.description: Every 3rd basic attack from Blanka stuns the target for [1s].

q.name: Smash!
q.description: Blanka smashes the ground, dealing damage to all enemies around him [20/65/245/440/500 + (100% AD)] and slowing their movement speed by [20%] for [1] second.

w.name: Taunting Presence
w.description: Blanka curls up for [3s], gaining [65%] damage reduction. Any enemy that damages Blanka during this time is taunted for the duration of the ability, and [7%] of the damage Blanka takes is reflected back to the attacker.

e.name: Bestial Charge
e.description: Blanka gradually accelerates, reaching [70%] of his movement speed over [3.5s]. Upon reactivation, Blanka can leap a great distance, knocking up enemies hit for [0.4] seconds and dealing [90/120/185/220/320 + 25% AD] damage. The distance of the leap depends on his current movement speed.

r.name: Earthquake
r.description: Blanka shakes the ground in a wide arc, knocking up all enemies for [0.45] seconds and dealing [270/400/520] damage to them.

level1.name: Enhanced Hard Hit
level1.description: Blanka's 3rd basic attacks now stuns for an additional [0.3] second

level1.name: Improved Reflection
level1.description: Taunting Presence reflects [20%] of the damage he receives

level1.name: Unstoppable Charge
level1.description: Blanka can't be CC-d during Bestial Charge

level5.name: CC Follow-up
level5.description: Smash deals [25%] more damage to targets who were CC-d in the past [2] seconds by Blanka

level5.name: Perfect Defense
level5.description: Blanka takes no damage during Taunting Presence, however he won't reflect any [can't be chosen if LvL1 b]

level5.name: Speed Boost
level5.description: Item: Upon activation Blanka moves [12%] faster for [1.5s]

level10.name: Aftershock
level10.description: Earthquake also slows by [30%] for [1s] after the knock-up ends

level10.name: Quick Cooldowns
level10.description: You lose your R ability, but your spell cooldowns are decreased by [3s]

level15.name: Physical Resistance
level15.description: Blanka gains [16%] physical damage reduction as passive

level15.name: Magic Resistance
level15.description: Blanka gains [35%] magic damage reduction as passive

level20.name: Speed Stacker
level20.description: CC-ing an enemy grants infinitely stacking movement speed [1 CC = 1 MS]

level20.name: Unstoppable Defense
level20.description: While using "Taunting Presence," Blanka becomes immune to crowd control effects.

level20.name: Second Life
level20.description: Item: You can instantly revive (345s cooldown)

level20.name: Break Through
level20.description: Earthquake breaks damage reduction for [1.2s] if it hits

changes: W Ability cooldown reduced from 16s to 14s
W Ability damage reflection increased from 5% to 7%
